-----------Enter bugs above this line-----------
RSE 1.0 Testing round 2
installation : eclipse-SDK-3.2.1 (M20060921-0945), cdt-3.1.1
RSE install  : RSE-SDK-1.0RC1.zip
java.runtime : 1.5.0_06-b05
os.name:     : Linux 2.4.20-8
------------------------------------------------
systemtype   : Linux (dstore-processes)
targetos     : Linux 2.4.20-8
targetvm     : 1.5.0_06-b05
------------------------------------------------

To reproduce the problem:
1) Show my processes in the table.
2) select a process and bring up a context menu to kill it
3) refresh the table. 
4) the same process is still listed in the table
5) try to kill it again 
6) You get the exceptions listed below.
7) open the PDE error log view to see the exceptions.
7) at this point if you click on the Remote System details  view, you get a "String Index out of range:0" error in the PDE error log.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0

verified that it is fixed in 1.0RC3. After step 3, the same process is no longer listed, and thus not possible to kill the same process again.
